title: Laurens ten Dam Smashes Transcordilleras Ultra
content:
The former Dutch roadie rides 650 miles and 72,000 feet of vert in three days and 47 minutes, finishing 48 minutes ahead of Rob Britton in second place.

Read the full article at Laurens ten Dam Smashes Transcordilleras Ultra on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
